detail_desc: Flared calf-length skirt in lace with a concealed zip in one side. Jersey lining.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an opening and ties at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, straight-cut jacket in stretch twill with a shimmering finish. Buttons and a frill detail down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and a button at the cuffs.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, pair of leggings and hat in organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a print motif on the front, lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist. Hat with a decorative knot detail at the top and sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Dungarees in soft, superstretch denim with decorative buttons at the top, a kangaroo pocket and elastication at the back. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbed hems.
V-neck blouse in georgette with an opening and button at the back of the neck, decorative gathers at the top and gathered 3/4-length sleeves.
Long-sleeved jacket in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jacket in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jacket in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in textured jersey with a small stand-up collar, long sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Gathers on one shoulder and at the side to create a softly draped front. Lined.
Earrings in various designs in metal with sparkly stones. Size 0.3-1.5 cm.
Earrings in various designs in metal with sparkly stones. Size 0.3-1.5 cm.

Push-up bra in lace and microfibre with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Push-up bra in lace and microfibre with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Textured-knit jumper in a cotton blend with a chest pocket, long sleeves and rolled edges.
Textured-knit jumper in a cotton blend with a chest pocket, long sleeves and rolled edges.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Lightly padded sleep bag in soft, patterned jersey with a round, scallop-edged collar, press-stud on one shoulder and a concealed zip in one side that opens from the bottom. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Bikini briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
V-neck dress in a viscose crêpe weave with short, knot-detail sleeves, a wrapover front with a tie at the waist, and an asymmetric hem.
V-neck dress in a viscose crêpe weave with short, knot-detail sleeves, a wrapover front with a tie at the waist, and an asymmetric hem.
V-neck dress in a viscose crêpe weave with short, knot-detail sleeves, a wrapover front with a tie at the waist, and an asymmetric hem.
Short, sleeveless, fitted dress in jersey with contrasting colour panels with decorative press-studs at the sides.
Imitation suede desert boots with lacing at the front and a welt seam around the soles. Twill linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Imitation suede desert boots with lacing at the front and a welt seam around the soles. Twill linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Imitation suede desert boots with lacing at the front and a welt seam around the soles. Twill linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Imitation suede desert boots with lacing at the front and a welt seam around the soles. Twill linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Dungaree shorts in washed denim with adjustable straps with press-studs, a chest pocket and press-studs at the sides. Fake fly, fake front and back pockets, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Short-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in woven fabric. Shirt in a cotton and linen blend with a grandad collar and buttons down the front. Shorts in Tencel™ lyocell with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly.
Opaque tights with a sheen and an elasticated waist.
Opaque tights with a sheen and an elasticated waist.
Metal rings in various designs.
Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details.
Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details.

Bracelets in various designs. Two elastic bracelets with wooden beads, two elastic bracelets with wooden and metal beads and one elastic bracelet with metal beads. One multi-strand bracelet in imitation leather with adjustable width.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with a terry anchor motif on the front, long raglan sleeves, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in printed sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in printed sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Wide top in scuba fabric with rounded shoulders and wide, dolman sleeves with pleats.
Wide top in scuba fabric with rounded shoulders and wide, dolman sleeves with pleats.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Imitation suede loafers with decorative studs and a grosgrain trim around the edge. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Shirt in woven fabric with a grandad collar, button placket and chest pocket. Long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs.
Shirt in woven fabric with a grandad collar, button placket and chest pocket. Long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs.
Shirt in woven fabric with a grandad collar, button placket and chest pocket. Long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs.
Jumpsuit in a soft viscose weave with a sheen. Collar, buttons down the front and cap sleeves with decorative ties. Smocked seam at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Jumpsuit in a soft viscose weave with a sheen. Collar, buttons down the front and cap sleeves with decorative ties. Smocked seam at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Jumpsuit in a soft viscose weave with a sheen. Collar, buttons down the front and cap sleeves with decorative ties. Smocked seam at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Dress in woven fabric with a collar, button placket and chest pocket with a button. Long sleeves with a tab and button, a belt, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Dress in woven fabric with a collar, button placket and chest pocket with a button. Long sleeves with a tab and button, a belt, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Dress in woven fabric with a collar, button placket and chest pocket with a button. Long sleeves with a tab and button, a belt, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Blouse in soft viscose twill with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pockets. Embroidery and a raw, frayed hem on the shoulders, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam at the waist with a flounce to the hem.
Dungaree shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a chest pocket, side and back pockets, buttons at the sides and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Dungaree shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a chest pocket, side and back pockets, buttons at the sides and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Short 5-pocket shorts in washed, printed denim with a high waist and raw-edge hems.
Short 5-pocket shorts in washed, printed denim with a high waist and raw-edge hems.
Short 5-pocket shorts in washed, printed denim with a high waist and raw-edge hems.
Short 5-pocket shorts in washed, printed denim with a high waist and raw-edge hems.

Dress in a soft cotton weave with stripes in glittery thread. Frills at the front that continue over the shoulders, buttons at the back and a flared skirt with a tulle underskirt. Woven cotton lining.
Chiffon dress with lace at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist with a partially pleated, flared skirt. Lined.
Short coat in soft faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and side pockets. Lined.
